desc: Handmade, eco-friendly, natural skin/haircare products for active, athletic women over 40 with sensitive dry skin looking to moisturize and rejuvenate themselves with only the highest quality of plant oils, Ayurvedic botanicals and penetrating actives. Get ready to Look Radiant, Look Bold, Look Naturaleez!

layout.text: Look Radiant, Look Bold, Look Naturaleez!

Bamboo packaging is sustainable; it is natural, renewable and biodegradable. Naturaleez is an eco-friendly face and hair product line that focuses on natural and organic ingredients that will help those hard working, athletic women with their dry sensitive skin.
